text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/device-operation-mode defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
normal Normal The device operates in a mode that supports the fulfillment of its clinical functions.
demo Demo The device operates in a mode that is intended for demonstration purposes only. Arbitrary values are generated.
service Service The device operates in a mode that is intended for correcting a functional problem of the device only. Arbitrary values may be generated.
maintenance Maintenance The device operates in a mode that is intended for preventative and/or scheduled maintenance purposes only.
test Test The device operates in a test mode that is not intended to be used for production/operational purposes.

name: FHIRDeviceOperationMode
title: FHIR Device Operation Mode
description: The operation mode of the device.

concept.definition: The device operates in a mode that supports the fulfillment of its clinical functions.
The device operates in a mode that is intended for demonstration purposes only. Arbitrary values are generated.
The device operates in a mode that is intended for correcting a functional problem of the device only. Arbitrary values may be generated.
The device operates in a mode that is intended for preventative and/or scheduled maintenance purposes only.
The device operates in a test mode that is not intended to be used for production/operational purposes.
